index.title: We are making a regenerative permaculture farm rooted in Compton Québec
text: Our belief is that local food resilience, our ecosystems health, and our food nutrition is in steep decline. This is our way to learn to fight back.

index.title: It’s a small start
text: Founded by Phil Malboeuf, programmer and permaculturist, it’ll be slow growing. But we’re here to listen, to be different, to find balance, and to make plenty of mistakes.
Here’s a look at our potential production and keep scrolling to show your support.
